posts.title: Getting Started with Next.js
posts.content: Next.js is a React framework that enables functionality such as server-side rendering and static site generation. This is why many developers choose Next.js over a plain React application.

posts.title: The Power of TailwindCSS
posts.content: TailwindCSS is a utility-first CSS framework that allows you to build designs directly in your markup. It provides low-level utility classes that let you build completely custom designs without ever leaving your HTML.

posts.title: Authentication in Modern Web Apps
posts.content: User authentication is a fundamental aspect of most web applications. There are several strategies for implementing authentication, including JWT-based authentication and NextAuth.js, a complete authentication solution for Next.js applications.
